lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We play Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking forward to meeting all those that we didn't have the opportunity to this time for hopefully future events. It went really well; we hope to do more community-centric things like this in the future. I'm very happy how it all turned out. The live show went really well. Thank you all for coming to that who could. That is coming out in February. Yes, so the VOD for The Search for Grog is coming out in February, we'll have details soon at critrole.com, so keep your eye peeled for that. Let's go ahead and bring it to our fantastic sponsorship for the evening. This week, we have our returning friends and family on the internet, D&D Beyond. Sam, if you don't mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Crit's About to Get Real!" from @JetPackPaul. "I Did Not Have Sexual Relations With That Manticore," that's Arsequeef. "Putting the 'D' in D&D Beyond" by @JarsonKames, and "Stay Turnt" by Brian Foster, so those are some good ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That one's taken, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, Dani, thanks for coming tonight.

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: Hi! You know, I really have more important things to do right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure you do, but thank you for volunteering.

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: You said you were paying me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Friends, Critters, countrymen. D&D Beyond is a horrifying wasteland of shame, and only I can pull it from the foul, swampy depths of--

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: Uh-uh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your default app background will be a picture of me. All characters get 69 hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To be determined. In fact, I would like you guys to tweet at me, at D&D Beyond, and, why not? At her, at Dani Carr--

lines.name: DANI
lines.text: @ItsDaniCarr.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: @ItsDaniCarr, with the #SamforPresident, and tell me which one of these guys or gals I should run against. Yes, because it's going to be a fun, exciting battle for the White House, or Gray House, or whatever color the building is where D&D Beyond is. Anyway, thank you, and god bless Samerica! (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Thank you, Dani!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run away. Run while you can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love how you just Weekend Updated your own sponsorship message. That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam; thank you, Dani; and thank you, D&D Beyond, for your unending patience with this weekly...this. Couple more announcements: the second season of Between the Sheets begins next week, this coming Monday, January 28, at 7:00pm Pacific. The VOD will be available on the Critical Role YouTube channel on Wednesday, January 30. The very first guest is a friend of the show, a musician, rapper, and all-around awesome nerd, Logic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And author.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And author, and all sorts of other awesome stuff. He's a very prolific young man, and I can say that because I'm older than him. Super excited, it's going to be great, and happy to kick it off with such an awesome guest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to be so good!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a good episode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been enjoying the crossover of a whole bunch of Critical Role fans going, "Who's "Logic?" and then a whole bunch of Logic fans going, "What's Critical Role?" I was like, this is going to be a train wreck of happiness. I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm excited. I want to give a very special thanks to our friends at Wyrmwood, who have continuously supported Critical Role and the community for a very long time. They actually created, for the live show and for the show here, this badass DM screen that I get to unveil!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, it a dragon!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, there's dragons! Put it back!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, that's beautiful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Special thanks especially to Jason MacDonald, who's the master craftsman at Wyrmwood, who made both this DM screen and the table that we play on to life. Jason, you did an amazing job. I had a chance of meeting him at the live show, but you're awesome. Another special thanks to Critter Chris Gladis for our "How Do You Want to Do This?" calligraphy design, which is also used on here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah, too much!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Chris, thank you. You did an amazing job.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give the DM some Xanax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So-- what have you done?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, I just found some weird writing on--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like you copied that at some point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I copy this from something? What is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me see that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't he have to copy some sort of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that was when we were talking about the four walls in the temple, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like the idea that you sleep-rune sometimes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I knew that this day would come.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (imitating record played backwards) Thank you, Satan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [water bubbling] [thunder] [explosion] (chanting) Role! Critical! Role! [dramatic Critical Role theme]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Villains beware 'cause you're about to be dead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Put your fate in your hands, take a chance, roll the dice! (chanting) Role! Critical! Role!

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: Now it's your turn to roll! [fire burning]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everybody. Last we left off, The Mighty Nein had been returning from Nicodranas. They had made their way northward from the Menagerie Coast, left their ship in the care of their favorite tortle to earn money at sea while you're away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like tortles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon perusing the streets, you came to discover that the location that Nott was leading you towards was in ashes: this apothecary. Upon inspecting the vicinity, you did not find a body, but you did find a basement where you found ruined furniture, a few traps, a chest, and a mysterious chair that has grabbed the nation's imagination.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Chair'otoa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) What is the chair? [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Y'all going to die. You thought the gazebo was bad. Anyway. So.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we put the chair in the bag of holding?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should've.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you also found that apparently the person who previously had lived there was nowhere to be found, and the son of that individual was being held at a nearby home of another person who lives here in Felderwin. You went there with Nott, Nott took the form of a halfling and proceeded to speak to this child as her son. After a bit of interesting conversation and curiosity, you said goodbye and you turned to find these two powerful magic users that Caleb had identified as members of the Cerberus Assembly were walking their way towards the ashen ruins of the apothecary, deep in conversation. That is where we left off. So, Mighty Nein, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before we leap in, could you give a quick physical description again of the two archmages?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had long, white hair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also elven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also elven. They are both elven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Deep blue robes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are currently a few houses down, standing outside of Old Edith's house, and in the moment of the tension of the conversation you had just had and the intensity of Nott's disposition, glancing and seeing them walking up and stopping right at the cusp and talking to each other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At the apothecary, not where we are? Two separate locations.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to go now. Right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Yes, we should get off the streets right away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These things we have, we have to get them out of here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know a place we can go. We can go to near the river. There's a river near here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lead the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. How far is the river?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you're standing here, not terribly far, maybe a ten minute walk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it the opposite direction of the hmm-hmm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could loop around a bit, probably go southward. You're not that far from the Samir River. You can scoot a southwestern direction in an arc, probably make it 15 minutes to avoid them entirely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take the cart too, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will lead them to a spot on the river bank that I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Moving past the handful of people in the city that are noticing this strange band of adventurers that have wandered through, you make your way past the outskirts and you can see the river itself cruising right along. It would be a beautiful landscape if there wasn't this intensity of emotion and the distant haze of long-grayed smoke that still hangs over the vicinity of the partially burned farmlands. Nevertheless, Nott leads you over towards one of the shaded banks under a few trees and you come to a stop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we being followed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First roll of the night, no fucking pressure. First roll of the night, you got this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That didn't count. That's good! 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing about, you do not see anybody keeping watch. What you do notice, however, is that a lot of the patrolling Righteous Brand, the small bands that have been keeping tabs, are all gathering towards the southern edge where the farm fields of the Felderwin Tillage hit the town of Felderwin. Where as they were scattered, they're all amassing in one space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We heard someone describe the operatives from Xhorhas coming up out of the ground over by the farmlands, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. That's as much as you've heard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So hey, what the fuck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's a good question, but also we just stole some very important things and we saw what is probably the owners going into the building. Is there anything we need to do in this town now to help you do what you need to do here, or can we leave?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, you can leave, but I need to stay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this person you're looking for here, do you know? Do you have any ideas?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know where he is, but I know that we'll find clues here or we may find clues here. I need to look. I need to look and I need to start right away, and I suppose you all can go if you want, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will stay and help you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll stay. Caleb, are you worried about another attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you so nervous about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are a target.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We were being stared at as we came through here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think there's a lot of things we need to cement up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is about as quiet a spot as I know in town, I don't want to go to a pub or anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, obviously not. We need privacy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it your son, or are you even a goblin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, all right. So you probably have some questions for me and that's all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One or two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a thousand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if it's your son, that's really sad, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. I'm sorry. I'm sorry for surprising you back there, and I'm sorry that I didn't tell you more before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, but I feel like-- I don't think any of us need to pretend that we all don't have some secrets. We've all been keeping some secrets from each other. Sometimes I feel like even maybe the thing that brought us together is that we're bonded by dishonesty, a little bit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not me, no secrets, open book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pretty open, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hear you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, some of us, anyway. For me, anyway, I've been holding onto some secrets. I feel like it's almost like putting up an armor or something to protect you from the past, or from regrets or something, and I feel like for some of us, it could also be like a chain, weighing us down and keeping us from moving forward. Maybe it's time now to remove that chain and be open and honest so that we can move ahead. So yes. I'll tell you what you want to know. What do you want to know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you a goblin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that your son for real?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, hi. My name is Nott the Brave and I am a little goblin girl, but once upon a time, I was Veth, a young halfling woman and before that, a halfling child who grew up being told that she was not pretty and not brave and not coordinated and not smart, and just not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And that's you? This is how you looked?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you're so pretty!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They were really outstanding. I collected wax seals and pieces of colored paper and some buttons and fabric.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You collected wax seals?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All kinds, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You still have those?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm afraid not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They didn't think so. I had brothers and people in town who would ridicule me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I lived here. One day, I was playing a game with some other boys and they dared one of their friends to give me a kiss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spin the Bottle!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The boy was very nice and he actually seemed to like it! He and I became friendly and eventually, we did what people do and got married.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, married! Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He didn't mind my strangeness and I helped him get his apothecary up and running. He was a brilliant chemist and could make acids and potions and oils and bleaches for fabrics and dyes and all sorts of things. I helped him and he took care of me. Eventually, we had a baby named Luke and he was a bright boy. Very smart, he learned to talk very early and walk very early. Such a smart boy! That's who you saw back there is my son.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So was he right? Did you die?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one there can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does your husband know? Does he not know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've sent him things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So he knows you're alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what he would think of me. The people in that town, they're taught to kill a goblin on sight or run and get help. Children are told rhymes. If he saw me like this, I don't even know if he would believe it's me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're here to help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long has it been?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not exactly. It's all sort of a blur.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we can get this fixed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're here now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can do something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just have to take some time, think carefully and slowly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think we have time. He's gone. They could be killing him now, these people that have him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we know who we think that is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it the people you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is anyone else-- Is there anyone coming? Do we hear anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing catches your eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can do something about this, but you're going to have to trust us and you're going to have to be careful because if we move too quickly, we're just going to go running the wrong direction and alone. And you need help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will try to restrain myself, but honestly, I don't know for how long.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would it help if we cleared your head?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can get back to it when you need it, but for now, maybe impulse may not be your friend right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. If you think so, Mr. Clay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and do that. We had a brief conversation about that last week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're casting Lesser Restoration?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try to un-drunk Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically alcohol is a toxin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have to be going for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so I'll allow it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And everything's back to being crystal clear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes the truth takes a little while to get there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This feels much worse. It feels terrible, actually. This is terrible. This is how you all are, all the time? This is not fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Majority.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, I know this place is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want some candy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, lots.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This place is quiet, but do you actually know if there a waterfall upstream a little bit, or a brook? Something with some noise that might drown out anyone who's listening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe somewhere where we can sleep, too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We walk upstream, maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there such a place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's not much in the way of a waterfall, unfortunately. You're in the center of the valley, so what hills there are, are just hills. The river here continues cutting through the valley, but you're probably a good, off the top of my head, 40 or so miles from any elevation to cause a major waterfall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any babbling brooks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're next to the river and what little noise it's making. It's nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know that there are tunnels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the farmlands.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is, I think, where all those soldiers were going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, maybe we should find somewhere in town to hold up, and we'll keep you out of sight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There was that one inn that burned down, but there is one inn you know called the Goldfield Tavern and Lodge. That's one of the more traveled inns. A lot of people that come in and out of Felderwin, that's one of the more popular destinations.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's your husband's name?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeza Brenatto.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just business; we don't have to let them know it's personal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's actually very clever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine, but-- and I'm sorry, Caleb. I'm sorry for what I said before. I feel like part of what we'll need to do to find him is to know what he was doing before he was taken, and that involves you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you definitely puked all over that apothecary, so it's clear that something's not right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't want to force you to do anything you don't want to, but I need you now. I need you to tell me what you know, what these people might be doing, or might have taken him to, or done with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it does seem like they were using him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is dunamis?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do you know them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot. You can take your time. As you're ready.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we going to...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to get somewhere safer first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Further away? Why don't we keep moving upstream? What's the direction away from the conflict?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's northeast and southwest. Northeast would be more in the direction of the fields and clearer view. Southwest would be further away from civilization.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also say, we can start the wagon up, and I can drive and keep an eye out. If you're all inside the wagon, no one's going to see any of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, let's head south.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's find a patch of woods to hide in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there woods?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's little clusters of trees here and there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It may be, in the end, safer staying in town. People staying in the woods seem like they're trying to avoid something, and there's a lot of soldiers. If you're on business, you go to town, even if the town's a little rough. We'll keep going around. When it's time to go, I think maybe we go into town and get a room. Maybe make a little bubble in the room, if we have to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to talk in town.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a long time, and if I see people, I'm not going to drive towards them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before we go, are you sure your son is safe with this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm not sure at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you tell her last? Are they staying? Are they going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Edith seemed to think that they were okay for the time being and that there's not going to be any more imminent attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do other people in town know that old Edith cares for your son, that they're connected in some way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does old Edith know your current form?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She just thinks you're not dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'm not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you think that your child made of that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's unsustainable. We need to know the ones we love, and I don't know what that was. I don't know how he felt, but for me it's a step. As painful as it was, it will be a step towards something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's incredible. I don't know if you realize that, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was terrible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was very brave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys have rubbed off on me, I guess.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to tell you what to do, but I feel like our previous experience would lean towards getting your son and her out of here, especially if the people that have taken your husband are still here. If they're searching for answers or asking people questions, that could lead to her and him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They could go stay with my mama. They could stay at the Lavish Chateau for the time being.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anywhere west, really.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now's the time to move them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right. How? How would I convince--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe it's not you. Maybe one of us go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go to tell them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not a bad idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do they get there? It's a dangerous journey, even for us. You saw the borders.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Loops into Caduceus' social worker plan, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if necessarily crossing the border is the way to go, but at least going further inland.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If they do decide to cross, I think they're less concerned with people going out more than coming in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know any place safe closer? Is Alfield safe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Safe as anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bryce is there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ask Bryce if they can take care of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think Bryce would be down for more responsibility and obligations?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not much to find some room and board for a couple people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If it does continue to drift that way, Bryce will be sure to get them out quick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or send word.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus, Alfield is near the border and the gates. Shorter journey out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could send a message, see if Bryce would be okay with that. What do you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, yes. Please do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a lot to figure. This will be one less thing to worry about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then we try to find Yeza?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely. Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to not be able to do this in 25 words. It's so hard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cast it twice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is going to Bryce?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is going to Bryce. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I believe in you, Jester. You can do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take care of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good. Don't talk in full sentences. Why didn't I think of that?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I say stop?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't waste it on a stop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, that's what you would do if you're doing the telegram.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could just vocally stop because Bryce will hear me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: LAURA. Right. Okay. I'm going to cast Sending.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Jester. Two people incoming. A woman and child. Take care of them, please? We're sending money with them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have two more words.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cut off the "is".

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought I had five more words!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have two more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Signed... oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it one word? Pleasehelp!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I think they're going to help!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That's something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bryce is shaking their head, trying to get better reception and it's not working.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Water in the ear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're cutting out and I can't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, sorry about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, shall we ride around a bit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, because I want to hear what Caleb has to say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also want to get a sense of things, so we're going to take a lazy meander around the area. I want to get a sense of where things are, get a map in my head, and I'm going to be paying very close attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through the city?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, on the outskirts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It'll take you a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep going around until they...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a perception check for me, Caduceus, as you guys are passing around the southern edge, heading towards the western side of Felderwin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, no, I'm so sorry, that's wrong. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are leaving Felderwin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Leaving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Does it look like they've discovered the tunnels, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know, you're too far away. You haven't really asked any specific questions to the local crownsguard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll be for civilization; that's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best you can see here-- the flames have been long out. What brief cinders and wisps of smoke that had been slowly burning themselves out over the past couple of weeks or so are on the very tail end. It looks like Felderwin has fallen to at least a semblance of temporary neutrality. The people are going about their lives, the Tillage-- the damage that has been done, has been done, and now it's just trying to pick up and move on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're in the wagon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in the wagon. You're now on the western side of the village where you can see the northward Tillage all around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm on the lookout, and I will let anybody know if anyone's within 60 yards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you listening, to where you can contribute?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm listening, but I'm not doing a very good job of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because you're checking out around us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because I'm--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Periscoping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Since we're going to try and be honest with each other and turn a new leaf--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you in love with me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was my teacher.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know why I told you that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't either.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Teachers are cool, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You slept with your teacher?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I totally made that up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just cared about your teacher.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know there's more pressing matters, but what did she teach you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How to kick ass and take names, bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Snaps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know. I guess it's easier to pretend like you don't care.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I figured you cared since you were checking up on her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm a little transparent sometimes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I totally thought she was your roommate. You were really good about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, don't get me wrong. I'd totally tap that, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, can we maybe circle back to the...?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb. We can tell you're really scared, and that's okay, to be scared. We just don't know why.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe if you share with us your apprehensions, it'll ease it a bit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (deep breath)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You got this, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your name is... Veth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My name was... Bren Aldric Ermendrud. Was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's why you looked at me, that day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I, uh...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you die, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Twinsies?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have been using you all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am from Rexxentrum. I attended the Soltryce Academy, and I was plucked by one of the Cerberus Assembly with a few others, and was being trained to do the kinds of things that I fear may have been done to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeza.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I met... I met you and was a little less hungry for a while. I have just been afraid for a long time, and two of the people in that town over there are on the Cerberus Assembly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know who they are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would they know who you are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so, but I have walked past their portraits at school many times.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ew.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're high up then, huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One of them is the head of the Cerberus Assembly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The head of the whole thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was that big?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mister Fancypants?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, isn't that where you want to go, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I did. That's the center of magical teaching in the Empire, as I understood it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really bad or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want you all to be seen with me, because if you are seen with me by one of them, they will use you to get to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I don't want them to see me either because they'll kill me and everyone I'm with, anyone in town, so I think we'll be hiding for some time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: His name is Trent Ikithon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sorry, Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not a very good person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think you're a good person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For the record, Nott, I don't think it's us that's been rubbing off on you. I think it's you that's been rubbing off on us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also, I don't think a very bad person would care about us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think a very bad person would care that he was very bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you care about us? You've told us several times how you've been using us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you secretly in love with me? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I start to unwrap one of my arms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Arms?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like the skin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I have been wearing bandages on my arm, and there are little, very faint scars all up the arm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cuts? Or burns?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are scars, faint scars, from cuts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From cuts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He used to put crystals in-- he experimented on us, on the three of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What would they do? Crystals?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was trying to strengthen us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The dunamis?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. The first time I had ever seen that word was in your libraries, just haphazardly scrawled into a book, no explanation. No, everything was for Empire. We were being trained to serve our Empire, above all else. He was a little mad, himself. That is-- he was mad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm curious as to how much was for the Empire and how much the Empire was a veil for his own personal exploits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He believed that the unwashed masses relied on their base instincts and the highest calling was to rise above the muck and control the cattle for the good of all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sounds like a bad person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we were-- are-- at war. Many of us felt that way-- feel that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you still feel that way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't believe in anything now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This Trent, does he know these two that we saw?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. I don't want one more thing on my head, to have you guys-- it's probably too late, anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How powerful are these two? Our normal tricks, would they fall short?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Cerberus Assembly are the most powerful mages in the Empire. Over two centuries ago, a number of mages went to war in the streets of Rexxentrum. It was bloody and awful, and eventually they came to a truce and banded together and proposed to the king at the time that they serve as an advising body alongside the throne.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would they see if we were disguised, or would they have to look for us? Do you know what I mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know for sure, but there is a reason why I did not use anything like that back there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At the same time, we need to figure out where--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would they have taken my husband? He was not a magic person. He was just a chemist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. It is something to do with the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It says it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I don't know why him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It says, "His instincts are solid."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What instincts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeza, I'm assuming. "While I find this alchemist obnoxious in his simplicity--" I'm sorry, I don't believe that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "The Academy's eye for talent proves itself again."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was he gifted? In his work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was very brilliant in his work, but I never saw him do any magicky things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he experiment?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It says they want him to produce a number of batches of that liquid, the one that we stole?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is what is written about there, it talks about-- Listen, I don't pretend to know what we're talking about, but it does not seem like anything that I ever studied.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was good at what he did. He could refine anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They wouldn't kill him then. They need him to make batches over the next 12 to 16 months.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure he's alive, but if he was good at breaking things down, taking them apart, experimenting on things, this thing that we have falls directly into that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It says they were looking for a way to achieve their ends without the object. I don't know what they need. I hope he is alive, I truly do. They will make his life very painful, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trent Ikithon was looking at Yasha. He was side-eyeing Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, she's really hot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like I've heard these words before, when we were in that bar. He looks for prodigies, people with innate talent. I don't think it matters--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If they took my husband, where would they have taken him? Their headquarters are in Rexxentrum?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At a school, at a--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The city of Rexxentrum.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The whole city is their headquarters?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're based there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Cerberus Assembly actually has a pretty heavy hold on Rexxentrum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the Empire. They are close to as powerful-- arguably more powerful than the King.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if maybe we can break him out before he gets there? Maybe he-- it only just happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they have magical means of transport?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We watched Lunidus Da'leth appear 200 feet in front of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So he could already be there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd be willing to lay money on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When did you get your new name?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I used a lot of names. Caleb is just what I told you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you prefer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know. Caleb; let's stick with Caleb for now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well...shit. It seems like if we are going to chase down my husband, you're going to have to go into danger. Too much danger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (stuttering) I honestly don't know if we can-- if we are up to this. Unless they're en route on land, maybe, but... that's all the might of the Empire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going to have to scout out and listen in on people's conversations, see if we can--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should ask to see if anyone saw a carriage, anything, leaving town with Yeza.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe if we go with our insurance company scheme, we can say that we believe there's been fraud and he's not really dead or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, you were going to say something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I just had more questions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: though. Your son mentioned that a mean lady with pointy ears keeps coming by.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was that one of these people that we saw?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lady--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They had pointy ears. They're elves, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're both elves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then what? One of them look mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if he's talking about Vess DeRogna--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that someone who would have-- do you know her to be someone who would be-- someone who could harness chemicals and--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She taught at the school-- not me, or years above me.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: What does that mean, antiquities?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would she be interested in the things that Yeza was helping?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's a historian. She knows-- she has uncovered mysteries of the past, they would say at school. She's a history buff and awful as well, probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could she be the one who is visiting my home?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It sounds like they've been here watching your husband for quite some time, which means checking in on your son.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Da'leth is Domestic Protection. He is the head of the military. If they are both here, I would imagine that he is here overseeing all of the Red Brands we saw and she is probably here trying to figure out what's in that bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then, do we have-- because I don't know how this all connects. Do we know why the cricks also attacked? Did they sense a disturbance in their juice or whatever that stuff is? The dunamis?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think maybe they're attacking because we have the thingy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've had the thingy for a long time. It doesn't explain why they would attack here, now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They could be combing the Empire for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It might not be the only one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels like-- it is a piece of dunamis, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, roll an intelligence check for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be smart. Be so smart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the notes, where it mentions beacons--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It says there's other beacons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: More than one, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and this thing that we had was called "the beacon." Right, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so there's more than one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was ages ago at this point. And now they're well into the Empire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "As we continue to invoke the beacon--" That means they have one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or had one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. "--with extremely focused energy of different spectrums and sources, divine and "arcane, the effects unleashed are ever curious and reach far beyond this laboratory. The dunamis "field often sightlessly encompassed an entire portion of the town, with locals complaining of an "ill sluggish sensation akin to being dragged down." So--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So they had one of our dodecahedrons here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, what if you put the dodecahedron on the tripod thing that we got, right? Then we hit it with some sort of spell. I wonder if it would amplify that spell, you know what I mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And also ring the dinner bell, Jester. I think that's the more dangerous part. We're super close to the front line, or at least to them. You do that, we might get exactly what we're asking for, but then trouble might also come calling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The people that we saw fighting, having the DC fight in the air, full on anime battle-- did we recognize the-- because I know they were wizards that were fighting the crick assassins that were coming in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seemed to be the case, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we recognise the clothing and appearance of the Archmage and Lady Vess? Is it the same people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Not the people that are currently with you now, no. The people that are in the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But the same robes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't a uniform robe. There is no-- and you would know this, too. Even mages in a union aren't like, "Let's all wear similar uniforms." They all very much see themselves as individuals in a circle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about the annexes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The annexes? People who-- it was in the lore that you shared with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh right, yeah. No. For students and everything there would be uniforms, but as far as members of the Assembly proper, there's no consistent uniform amongst members of the Assembly. As is the nature when you get to a certain level of arcane capabilities, even working with other mages, there's a general, for the most part, an idea of "Well, I'm still better than them."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These papers conjecture that in Ghor Dranas they are able to control fate and time. Clearly it was stolen from them and brought here, so it could be the source of their presence here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, you were in the library of the Cobalt Soul when you stumbled upon dunamis for the for the first time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What were you looking for when you found it? What were you trying to find?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was studying history, and-- I need to become more powerful if I want to do anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You still haven't answered my previous question of how you were using us and what that means to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at me. I am a string bean, I am weak as it comes. I am weak. Look at that. Look at her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Her guns are bigger than mine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have no guns. That was an exaggeration that day. You are just fast and quick and talented.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Was that a compliment?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's kind of like when you smile.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like there's a difference between using someone and relying on someone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was going to say. Do you think that Fjord was using us? You think that Nott's been using us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) Shut up, Travis.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, we're also here volunteering our help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's only using us if you don't like us. Do you like us, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ja!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) I... Oh, Jester. I am glad you see good in me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I don't think we see it in the same way that you do. It's too late now because, whether you like it or not, we all care about you and are invested in, you know, your happiness, I guess? So...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't run. You can say you don't believe in anything, and that's fine. Believe in us, just a little bit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will consider it heavily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, you saying that you don't believe in anything kind of put everything into perspective about that conversation. I heard that you were doubting me and us, and our friendship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (louder) You too!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He could give two shits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to have to do this twice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One last time!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That one will be off-camera.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very off-camera.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So do we avoid your two professors? Or do we try to study them, divide them, interrogate one of them--

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord, they're way too powerful for us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? I swallow shit and make it appear in my weapons; I'm fucking down to throw, you know what I'm saying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can control water, which I can do too; I'm not that powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't have to minimize my new shit, okay? I'm real proud of it. I've had it for a fucking hot second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just saying, they've probably been studying for a very long time. And if I'm not wrong they're elves. And elves live for a very long time. And they look kind of old, okay? So they're probably--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The elder gentleman started the Cerberus Assembly over 250 years ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Well, what about the one that studies history? You met a bunch of really dangerous historians?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, I have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I know, man? I'm a fucking sailor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're pretty powerful, okay? You're really strong. You're very handsome. You got some really cool spells. You can make darkness appear. It's really awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Listen, Jester-- As much as I love this, it's not about me, okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, if you all don't stop arguing, I'm going to turn this cart right around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, sir!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if you were arguing, I've just always wanted to say that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were. We were having a big fight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So what do we do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start heading back to town regardless; it's getting cold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to send your son on his way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we need to try and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a tangible goal that we can do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to ask if your husband was spotted leaving by some sort of natural means?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then we kill the two elves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Easy peasy lemon squeezy. Maybe we go up into their room at night or something and just, you know... Stabby stab.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you seduce one, I'll seduce the other, no problem. I have a way with elvish folk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like you two have been reading Tumblr. This is so-- Sorry, carry on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll deal with one thing at a time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would make me happy to even know that he's alive. To get some sort confirmation that someone saw him alive or...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we talked about sending a message?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp) Maybe I can send a message to him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, if he's in Super Magical Headquarters, I'm sure there might be protection against that, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that a bad idea? That's a bad idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, what? You trying to find out if someone's alive?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Your Wildmother-- the thing you did for me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caduceus is a wild mom?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Nope. No, he has--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's such a wild mom; he's partying all the time!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So many wine spritzers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Moms gone wild?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Moms gone wild. What? Hmm?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is the process by which you would...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would just-- I have a little ritual in the morning, meditate on it, see if I can feel anything tugging in some direction; and I couldn't know much, but I could know something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well do you think, Caleb, that they would sense that? Is that a magical force? Is that a divine force?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a divine force, but I don't think that it would--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have to do it in the morning or can you do it at night?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well I mean, I'd have to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh; I understand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It all depends on how he reacts if Caduceus is able to contact him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I couldn't know much. But I could maybe, at the very least, give you a yes/no. Maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would make me very happy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we head to the inn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't talk about anything when we're in the town, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except someone has to ask about--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can do that. Cover of night. Helps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well I'm happy we're coming to town to talk to this famous alchemist and this has really thrown something into our plans. I don't know what-- Do people throw monkeys into plans? What do people throw?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a wrench.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A wrench? Yeah, this has wrenched our monkey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A couple of us tonight-- not me, but a couple of us could check the town out, and ask some questions, and ask if many people were taken away or not.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm, not a bad idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To the inn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm already heading that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take everything that we've been looking at and stick in the bag so it can't be scried on or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way towards the center of the city, leading them towards the Goldfield Tavern and Lodge. Heading inside, it's fairly empty. You place the cart outside for the time being. Towards the bar on the far end, you see the familiar face of Simone Deepwell. He's the halfling, the barkeep, and owner. Dark brown skin; short, gray-white hair. Very cheerful demeanor, he seems to be excited at the prospect that folks are stopping in with all the chaos that's happened as he leans over the front of the counter and goes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to look like just a gnome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Just a gnome. The rest of you keeping it as is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hood up and I'm still dirty as sin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I've still got a little bit of time on my shaggy redhead. Wait, no. Am I out now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of the illusions you had in the city have faded at this time since you've been traversing the exterior.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, same.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to button up and go full Cobalt colors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Anyway, Simone leans forward and goes, "Why hello there! What can I do for you? "You looking for rooms for the night?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How many is that? Book a room each?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four rooms? Three?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three rooms, I think, should do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How many?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Three? Three rooms, all right. Well, we got plenty of space with events being as they have "been. That'll put you back about, let's say one gold, one silver for the three?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sounds like a very good deal. Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, no worries."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll pay for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you need anything, let me know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said with events being as they have been. We noticed there's been a ruckus recently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, you could say that. You could say that. I mean, 'ruckus' is a word."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Calm the last few days? Any reason why we should be apprehensive this evening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I certainly hope not. We've kind of seen kind of the craziest thing Felderwin's ever seen "in most of its history since war with the Dominion. So I sincerely hope not. I mean, it's "one less competitive inn, but poor Jer. I just feel bad for everyone that lost their homes and "businesses in that affair. It's not good."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understand. The aftermath, we saw troops leaving on our way in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, they've been here a few weeks just walking around. Just in case they came back."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They catch any of those that were guilty of all this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. They came in without warning. Just tore through, burned things and left."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were hoping to buy some potions while we were here. Do you know if there's a good alchemy shop or anything around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, see, the only real alchemist around here was one of the homesteads that "burned down, unfortunately."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's probably your best bet."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know? The alchemy shop, what was the name of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, that was the Brenatto Apothecary."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brenatto Apo-- Do you know if this Brenatto is around, still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Last I heard, Brenatto went missing. Could probably ask the crownsguard. I don't think "they've updated anything. But--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most of the folks here got killed in the fire, so might best ask them."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Crownsguard is probably our best bet if some of the people we're looking for happen to be still missing in the aftermath, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can imagine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Appreciate ya.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No worries. We have two meals here: one shortly after dusk; and bright and early in the "morning, right after sunup. You got about an hour window. If you miss it, well, there's plenty of-- "Should be plenty of food amongst the city to find, so good luck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we miss the meal already today, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nah, you've still got a few hours before sundown, so just come on by and go ahead "and get me and my wife cooking."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is going to sound weird, but is there a florist around? Or anybody who deals with exotics? Exotic herbs, plants, or otherwise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You mean herbs and spices? Yeah. I mean, there's Felderwin General has all manner of "various flavorings if that's what you're looking for."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something exciting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So can't say my experiences are a good basis of comparison, if you catch my drift."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking forward to a little quiet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You and me both. Now all them soldiers are out of here at least. I'm going to miss the "coinage, but I ain't going to miss the riff-raff."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, no worries. I'll see you around dinner time, then."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ducey. A florist?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need something. It's nice to have something complicated to use to focus myself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Complicated? Is that what you said?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (puffing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not quite, but yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? I was joking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like tea?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poppy seeds?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything. Preferably some sort of flower or living plant but if it's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chamomile? Black-eyed Susans?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The notion is, I'm looking for something that is a testament to the abilities of the Wildmother, so anything that is a gift from her to us. Something impressive, something beautiful, something tasty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Honey!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never tried honey. I don't know if it would work, but that's interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it's essence of flower and bee puke. It's a miracle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I usually tend to stick a little closer to the source. I also don't really necessarily know how I would perform the ritual with honey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a decent amount of molasses, if you like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I honestly don't know the difference between molasses and honey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, one is the bee poop; but molasses comes out of a tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tree poop and bee poop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it's more of a-- it's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let it ride.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have some tobacco.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That might be interesting, but I think I should probably see if there's anything around, possibly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She was also a firbolg.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not sure how that relates, but that is a very beautiful feather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well. Yeah, that's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to, make an investigation check to wander about the town to see if you can manage to muster some supplies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can give him some advice on places to look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you would-- yeah. Take some advantage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That brings me to a-- that's a 19, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Felderwin would be one of the few places in the empire where the Wildmother would be very popular if she weren't outlawed, and you get the sense that there might even be an unspoken worship to her amongst this very rural farming community.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm hoping to find an orchid or something. Something interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to go to both Felderwin General and, with Nott's help, sneak into one of the elaborate specialty herb-growing boxes, specifically for the purpose of various medicinal herbs. We'll say, over the period of the next 30 minutes or so, you gather what would be about 25 gold worth of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was my pre-game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Anyone else got anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is not nighttime yet, we're just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but you're getting closer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're keeping an eye out for any cloaked, robed elven people. Yeah, we're trying to avoid them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would Nott know of a general physician, a doctor? Someone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we have one with us-- two with us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Local doctor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Local

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That might know locals?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, someone who might have repaired one of the soldiers or something like that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It said in those papers about them being sick from the-- the town complaining about sluggishness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know there is a female human physician in the town. There's a number of physicians and people, but there is one named Demi Leric, who is the altruistic member of the community. Doesn't charge, but accepts donations and is often the first to try and help out those of the more meager lifestyle in this farming community.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Demi Leric, you say.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dr. Demi Leric, medicine woman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) More or less. Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I also want to find a crownsguard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scrawny, human-looking fellow, looking like he's mid-30s or so, chin scruff, but can't quite grow a full beard. Like me, apparently.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a lovely, full beard, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm still getting used to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whisper) Come forth! Come forth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (explosion) I'll split off from the group so that I'm not drawing attention. Excuse me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey. Yeah, can I help you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm staying at the local inn right now. I have a friend. He's losing a little bit of his hair, and he was hoping--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can't say I'm too familiar with hair tonics, per se."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what kind of potions can be made. Do you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're looking for anything too fancy, I'd probably recommend heading on to Zadash."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay. What about alchemy? Is there a local alchemist or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not anymore, unfortunately."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was one of the buildings we lost to the cricks a few weeks back."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! The building is gone; what about the person that ran the shop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hell if I know. Cricks ran in here and started killing people left and right and "left in the same hour they arrived. It was like a swift nightmare, tearing through here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do they look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me tell you, did you ever have one of them terrible dreams where something comes out of "the darkness and tries to grab at you and cut at you? It's burning eyes of evil and dark armor of "shadow and nothing?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, imagine a bunch of them popping out of the ground and cutting down your friends--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did they pop out of the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hell if I know! A bunch of ground-dwelling, weird, dark elf folk."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you have to fight them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I fought a number of them myself, trying to protect my buddies here, but "not everyone was so lucky."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You must be so brave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, no. Just--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, you look really brave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm just doing my job, ma'am."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow! Well, all right. I guess I'll have to go to another town for a potion. Can you point me in the direction of this shop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The one that was here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's right over-- you go head down two blocks and to the right, follow that on for about "seven, eight or so buildings on the left. It's hard to miss. It's the second one on the left "that's burned down."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Hey, maybe the owner ran away or something, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here's to hoping."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Fingers crossed!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything else you're looking to find out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I just wanted to see if they saw him leaving the town. That's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd probably have to find somebody who was a little more in the thick of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That soldier was totally hitting on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A lot of soldiers hit on me. It's no big deal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He wasn't even here when the fighting happened. He was lying. Sorry. So brave. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone else want anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to find Demi Leric.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It takes you a little while. Not too long with Nott's help guiding you in that direction, but finding the right building-- because the sign itself that has Demi Leric's name on it is itself smoke-covered from-- it's across the street from one of the buildings that was damaged by the fire. As you walk over towards the edge, the door is partially ajar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (knocking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them appears to be asleep. The other one is sitting there with a fresh set of bandages put over burns. You see Demi turn around. Human woman, maybe late 20s, early 30s or so, heavyset, bright smile, bright eyes, but sleeves rolled to the elbows and all business. She turns around, and the fingers are hit with whatever material was used to apply the burn bandages to the one soldier. She wipes her hands, this viscous oil-like substance, and wipes them on a cloth. "Well, can I help you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, yes. I'm Beauregard of the Cobalt Soul. I've been sent here from Zadash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you have a few minutes, I would love to ask you a few questions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly. Feel free to go and ask."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're taking statements from people, trying to figure out some incongruencies that might have been happening over the past few months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Incongruency, all right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you ever notice any increased amount of patients feeling sick, sluggish, anything off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've had a few strange complaints maybe about a month, two months ago. Just a wave of "general, a nauseous-- I assumed it was maybe some bad food that got through a bit. Wasn't too serious."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wave of nausea? Anything else? What makes you think that they were related, as opposed to general food poisoning? What was strange about them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I assumed maybe it was related."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did they all happen to live in a similar area of town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, they were all in a cluster right in this region, which is why they all came to me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All in a cluster. Sorry, just taking notes, just want to make sure I get everything correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, no worries."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Anything else that seems like it might spark your memory of being a little bit odd?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, the town was attacked, and people were killed and burned. That's strange."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Did you know a man by the name of Yeza?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, he was right down the street."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he come in around that time with the batch of people who were feeling nauseous?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. To be honest, I was busy trying to treat who I could. That was not a good day."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was all one day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly buildings were up in flames, people were "screaming. I looked out there, and there were cricks running through the street."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you mind if I talk to a few of your patients for a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be my guest."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you think of anything, if you remember anything-- I don't have a card, but I'm staying-- I'll be in town. I might be back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great. Well, if you think of any other questions, feel free to ask."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, miss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next time on Colum-Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the part where she then goes, "And one more thing..."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "One more question." (multiple Columbo impressions)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For our younger audience: Columbo was a television series.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to go over to one of the guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there is one that appears to be asleep, who looks to be a little more combat wounded. The one that's semi-conscious is mostly burns.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the one who's semi-conscious conscious enough to speak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems to be. He's sitting there going (pained breathing).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go up and slap one of his wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pained yelling) "What is wrong with you?! Who are you?!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Sup? Name's Beau. With the Cobalt Soul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jeff." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, it's spelled weird. G-E-O-F-F.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's got two apostrophes between the Fs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The umlaut's over the second F.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look, man. Not everyone in a fantasy setting has awesome names.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good to meet you, Jeff. You patrol the cluster normally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, when I'm not laid up like this."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look pretty badly burned, obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very thoughtful."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give him a little bit of my wine from my wine pouch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I accept your recompense."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Demi's like, "Wait, wait, wait! No, no, no!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Demi, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's already had enough."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jeff, I was curious if you happened to know what happened to Yeza Ber-de-ger-de-ger--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brenatto?

lines.name: MARISHA
