lines.text: Brenatto, or if you were around when the apothecary burned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. That's where I got all this."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Managed to get his son out, it seems."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. Cricks got him and ran."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The cricks got him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you see which direction they ran?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Back to the fucking hole. They headed northward."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're sure it was the cricks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah! Was four of them."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Did you see anything else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I saw the fire they pushed me into when I tried to stop them!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were the one who got Luke out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, me and two others, but they didn't, you know, fare as poorly as I did."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Anything else you remember, anything spark in your mind trying to figure this shit out? I know that's vague.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fires were set before we knew what was happening."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you feel like they were looking for something in particular? Were they targeting places?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I guess? The last place they lit was the apothecary."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Well, look; you did a good thing, all right, man? You saved a kid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: here. I pull out 20 gold, throw it on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes go wide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can split that up with your friends, or if you want to keep it, I don't really give a fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you're from the Cobalt Soul?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep! Bye! Then I run away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Traci?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, Laura. Hey, Laura. That's a pretty good penis you drew over there. It's very lifelike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, it's big!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam told me to!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you hear what was revealed in that moment just now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's coming from the depths.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looks like some stuff happened there, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is serious, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else doing anything before you guys reconvene? Is there anything else you want to look for, or are you ready to gather?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It feels like we're supposed to do something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I'm just curious. If you've completed your investigation--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, oh! Is there a furniture maker in town? Because I really would like to ask them questions about that chair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My husband is missing!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, there's just dicks over there, I don't know what to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no escaping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just potential dicks, now. That's better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just potential dicks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. The opportunities...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there specific areas where the tunnels were collapsed after they went back in and covered them up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go look if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we should look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we meeting back up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we should meet up and then search.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, meet back up. I kick down the door and I go: Apparently he was taken by cricks! Then I fill them in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, he was?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we call them Kryn, please?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Kryn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what they actually are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently he was taken by Kryn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was taken by Kryn? Not by--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I talked to some soldier boy named Jeff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Weird name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, right? His parents must not have loved him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think Jeff's a really nice name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, a lot of Jeffs right now are fucking giving you the bird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jeff's a great name, that's why I used it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jeff is a great name. Keep going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, keep digging.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell me what Jeff fucking said!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He said four Kryn came in, scooped up your husband, and ran off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, he saw that happen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he was there. He ran in and he saved your son.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, shit, this changes everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait. What is the possibility that your mean people can change memories?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Still, we should at least investigate this lead now, and tomorrow, if we don't know what's going on, I can-- and I warn you, I will do this, but I'm going to get a little exhausted doing it-- I can at least give us some sense of what's ahead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I try to send him a message and see if he responds?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Couldn't hurt.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: It could hurt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could definitely hurt. If she sends a message and he's with the Rexxentrum folks--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would they know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They might be able to sense that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you talking about what Nott and I do or what you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's between you and your god, Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't they respond to your messages?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, but I can say, "Don't respond if you're by anybody that, you know--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or "If you're alive, just say ow"?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good. What if I do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we try Mr. Clay's idea first? See if he's alive and then we'll try to send a message.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a look at these tunnels. I'm actually very curious about this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll go find a nearby crownsguard and see if they can point us in the direction of where some of those collapsed tunnels were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you heading to the tunnel first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it dark yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By this point, you guys gathering, yeah, dusk has happened. You can eat first or miss your meal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We only have an hour. We need to get our free food.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get a little food and then we'll check it out by night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this distance, you can't see any further than a few inches to indicate that that seems to be where it was, and the guards are keeping a perimeter just in case anything were to return.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll walk up. Excuse me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach he's like, "Hi, can I help you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We heard this was the scene of all the unfortunateness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, that's what I hear, too."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has it been cased, this area? Searched for, I don't know, anything left over by the invading hordes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As far as I know. I'm just stationed here, but they've been looking this thing up and down "for two, almost three weeks now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The guard, the Righteous Brand. Some of them fancy folk from Rexxentrum."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fancy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I mean, they're all fucking fancy from up there, but some of them elvish people."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What were they doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't fucking know. They don't talk to me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. You know if they found anything, took anything out of the dirt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They tell you that these might open up again, or they might be in imminent peril? I see there's eight of you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I certainly hope not. From what I can tell, wasn't just the cricks." Then one of the other guys, one of the soldiers, goes like, "I was here. I saw it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something dug it for them."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was a big old mouth made of teeth just carved out of the ground and then withdrew, "and then they poured out."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My god, that sounds terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, yeah! I hate this job."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When you saw the big mouth with teeth? What'd you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fucking ran! What do you think I'm going to do?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn right, fast as you could I'll bet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other guys look at him, like (scoffing) and he's like, "What?! "You would've done the same!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it like a worm or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Something like that, yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did it come out of the ground or did it go back in after?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We were like, 'What the fuck is that?' Then the cricks came running out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think the Kryn came out of the worm thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, it's possible."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How big was this creature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know, it was big. From what I saw it was maybe, I don't know, ten feet wide?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, that's significant. Were you also here or far away when they made their hasty retreat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was over there." He points off maybe a hundred or so feet away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keeping an eye out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you see anything that was driving them off or were they just taking their sweet time as they left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point the other, first guard you were talking to goes, "Hey, what's your "business here, anyway?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like share and share alike, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He nods for a second and goes, "All right, so, I guess have a look around. It's already been "given the once-over many times, so take a moment if you need it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has anyone gone down and followed the tunnels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He points over the third one and he goes, "They've been digging that one for about "two weeks, but eventually gave up."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why'd they stop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They collapsed them behind them and there's only so much you can go. If they dug all the way "from Xhorhas, do you have any idea how long those tunnels would go for?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pretty long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't really have that kind of manpower here in Felderwin. The soldiers all left, so "I'm not going to keep digging."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I appreciate it. We won't take up much of your time. We thought we'd have a gander around, if that's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Eh, go for it. How many you got?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you're all investigating?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some of us are just hanging out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It wasn't our intention, but things being what they are, this seems to be the new reality of the world, doesn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll be keeping an eye on you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. Being that fancy folk were here, I don't suppose there's any point in doing our particular brand of searching.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a question. When you Blink out-- I haven't done it very much, but I feel like it's the Ethereal Plane, right, that we go to?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Ethereal Plane?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Traveler told me about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't talk to The Traveler.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, I feel like we go to this other plane, right? You can walk through things on that plane, because it's not quite the same. So what if we Blinked, and then we could go through where they collapsed the tunnel? Then we could be in the tunnel and just see, you know? Then come back!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a good idea, except for what if the whole tunnel's collapsed and we Blink into the earth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I don't think you can do that. Right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I imagine anything is possible in this world of magic and mystery, but I bet it would hurt a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't Blink if the spot is taken up, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say if you were attempting to Blink into a solid space, it would shunt you out of the space and you would take a little bit of force damage. General rules for shifting out of ethereal space into matter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That one scares me a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know about you, but when I Blink, I can only appear about ten feet from where I previously was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I mean! We Blink right here. Then we walk where the tunnel was and we go into the tunnel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can walk through stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we could just do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I'd want to know where I was going, and I can only go alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm no expert on worms, but I would imagine that it is more collapsed earth than open space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would imagine so as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They chew their way their way through the earth and poop out the remains.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just honey all the way back.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Or molasses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So much nature poop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So our choices are--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should have this conversation in here, because I want to take a look around in this thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the tunnel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, they offered us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's sunken earth, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just pitch black below.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you cast Light. The soldiers take a step back as soon as they see you make a gesture and brightness seems to appear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all in the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you head down inside?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, yeah. Unless anybody's got an objection.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. Oh, you're doing your walk thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm just walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't just glide through stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, is that true? Oh. I didn't know that. Well, I don't have that as an option right now, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a few carts at the base carrying dirt and rock up. You can see shovels and pickaxes and all sorts of materials that have been left behind by the team that gave up trying to excavate this tunnel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no marking on it? This is an obviously organically-carved tunnel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks to be, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The footprints going in and out, there's nothing--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. Never really done one of those. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There are all sorts of footprints in here. There have been soldiers and crownsguard and all sorts of people in and out of this tunnel. You can see cart tracks and everything, but you can definitely tell that the edges of the top of the tunnel have a smoother, natural carving to them, whatever creature it is definitely burrowed. With that roll, I'd say you do make out a few footsteps that resemble more armored boots that are more unique against the profile of the general crownsguard and/or Righteous Brand soldiers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In both directions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In both directions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Interesting. Very interesting. They were definitely in here and they definitely left this way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any reason to use your radar and see if anything was missed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My radar? What do you mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything magical. Anything arcane.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Detect Magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Nothing in the vicinity catches your attention, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing, really. Just for fun, because we can, Eyes of the Grave, too. Just for fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Nothing catches your attention there either.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No? I figured. Nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we could continue following this tunnel for several hundred miles and see where it goes, or we could take my son to Alfield, or we could head to Rexxentrum and start tracking down Caleb's old teachers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're still here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They are? I thought they bamfed out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know. We don't really know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, they bamfed in. Didn't see them leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but they can do that in a basement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but we can kill them too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm all for it. What do we do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we shouldn't try and assassinate the head of the Cerberus Assembly; not right now, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is overwhelming!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just as a warm up. All right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we know anyone who can help us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just made an alliance, sort of, with Yussa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yussa's pretty powerful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't get back there for weeks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could message.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could send him a message!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could also go back to Zadash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know folks there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the morning, and I can't guarantee this, but we'll at least know if he's alive and maybe a sense of whether or not he's above ground or below ground and that'll certainly inform our decision.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe. I'll glean what I can but, it's a soft process.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to abandon this tunnel? I can jump forward 90 feet in a direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you bamf forward and there is stuff blocking the way, will you get really hurt?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. I think I'll get shunted out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you talking about the thundery one that's real loud?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a little different.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It won't collapse the tunnel on our heads when you do it, will it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could just walk 90 feet ahead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The tunnel is blocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: About 200 feet in, the tunnel is blocked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have no idea how deep the blockage goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so you're aware, Thunder Step, as most teleportation effects, you have to teleport to a location you can see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In my mind's eye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, if you want to get real crazy, roll the dice!

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Roll the dice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there's air to vibrate or I'm making sound in solid rock as a boosting of your-- It may not work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I see what you're doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying to use some sort of nature theory here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's interesting. It's a cantrip, so there's definite limitations on its ability.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the most powerful spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Thaumaturgy and I'm like: Whoa, that's really cool! Did you see it? There's a bunch of whispers of people going, "That's so cool!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can get really loud. That's the question, is can I get loud enough to hear myself like if I was trapped in there? Or am I-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say two things: One, roll just a straight wisdom check for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Straight wisdom check. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like, "It's going to collapse!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm picturing like a didgeridoo.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: (low rumbling noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've run it for awhile, you've cast the vibration into the rock. What are you going to do to try and listen for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Honestly? I'm going to try and see and cut it off to see if there's an echo coming through the rocks, basically, in that split second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Into it! 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could be just a small pocket, it could be a continuation of the tunnel, but there does appear to be some minor element of vibration that carried through with some differentiation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How deep are we underground right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the full end of this tunnel? I'd say you're about 80 or so feet deep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not going to inform anybody of anything that just happened and be like: Okay, I'm good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: Back to the inn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys gather your thoughts, and march back to the inn in the evening air over Felderwin, we're going to take a break.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to be right back here in a few minutes. In the interim, we have our fantastic friends at Wyrmwood's Wyrmwood giveaway! Run, run like the wind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's running. She has to go do the other D&D streaming show that she's on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow. That was good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is Bolivian rosewood. Nice leather interior there, really nice dice box going to one of our friends out there. For you guys wanting to enter this drawing at the break, head on over to the Critical Role Twitch chat, that's twitch.tv/criticalrole, and enter the key phrase "tension." T-E-N-S-I-O-N.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, it's like last week ended with a lot of tension. Enter it once; more than once you'll be disqualified, and unfortunately due to giveaway rules, only people in the US and Canada excluding Quebec can enter. We'll have a winner when we return, so see you guys here in a few minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The winner tonight is palingratz. Palingratz, congratulations! We'll get that sent to you ASAP, and we'll have our next giveaway next week. As you all return back to the tavern where you're staying, the Goldfield Tavern and Lodge, you gather your thoughts and yourselves in your respective chambers. What would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, we should have talked about this during the fucking break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, that would have been out of form for us. No. We don't do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We plan everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, I got a hint of something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think maybe there's something past that wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, in the tunnel? You're not talking about my husband who I want to know if he's alive or not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't know that until dawn. If we do decide to go that direction, I think that there is definitely a chance that we could dig far enough and deep enough to make passage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys. Hot take. The Kryn aren't the bad guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a hot take. It's funny that you said that because-- and it may have been because I was not drunk at the time. I was thinking, when you were talking, Caleb, or Bren, about Rexxentrum and how it's heavily protected and guarded, and how it's impossible to get in and make an assault on it, I immediately thought, well, what if we went in with the Kryn and attacked with them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To do...?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you talking about aligning ourselves with the people that ganked your husband?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First of all, he might be dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll know tomorrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He might be ganked, but he might not be ganked by who we think ganked him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: So many unknowns!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did not say that it is heavily fortified, although I'm sure it is. It is the largest city in the empire. When I lived there-- and it was only briefly when I was at school-- I could go anywhere in the city I wanted because I'm a citizen of the empire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume it's a hard place to attack or infiltrate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The largest city in the empire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rexxentrum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That would be hard to attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless you could dig underground with a bunch of pet worms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does make one wonder why they haven't done that yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe they're baby steps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Doesn't feel like too many places on the map are off limits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That might work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is all very confusing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All from the cluster.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to poke this thing tonight, or do we not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Poke the tunnel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not the tunnel. I mean--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What thing were you talking about poking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have an object. We have another object. Maybe we haven't really-- I mean, I doubt that we really understand what we have, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to head towards Xhorhas, is what you're saying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, we have these things right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you saying you want to look at them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I kind of do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because Yussa said we shouldn't pull it out. Especially right now, if people are looking for it, it could be really bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I suppose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the thing. You're talking about poking that thing? The dodecahedron?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. That's what he's talking about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To do what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Normally, all about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If Fjord is saying that is a bit-- then you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll follow the group, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dragon sucked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- I'm here because where I was, I was out of options. We've definitely found some options. I don't know what they mean yet, but I went looking for them, and here we are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb-- sorry, Caduceus. Freudian slip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Carl. Kevin. Keep going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jeff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a "K" sound.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said the life force was being sucked away from your grave, from your home.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We haven't had much communication with the other sites, so I don't know if it's happening anywhere else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to send them a message?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're supposed to protect that place, and I was running out of ideas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said we.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My family.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many of them are there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, lots. I mean, depending on when and where. Members of my family and others have been protecting that place for as long as it has existed. We built the temple. We founded it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your family's still there now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, they all left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said also to look for answers, though, right? They left first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and none of them have come back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have any idea which direction they were heading?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not really.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can speak to the Wildmother. You've checked in on a few of our friends. Do you ever check in on them, see what the Wildmother tells you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like she would let me know if I needed to know. That's not an answer I really want the-- that's not an answer I'm looking for right now. I'm sure you understand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You all seemed like a very good sign that it was time to take some responsibility.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was your name before this? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's such a good name!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a good name. Spelled it with a "G."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a great name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got nothing to hide.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Geoff with a "G" or Jeff with a "J"?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "G". What's wrong with you? Don't even--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we go to sleep so we can find out if my husband's alive?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I have anxiety. I may not sleep tonight, now. It's a lot of pressure to put on a person.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Herbal tea, some melatonin, something, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be up all night. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester, you okay?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's wrong?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a little overwhelming. I mean, this is some serious shit. I mean, I came from Nicodranas, and everything was nice. The empire is really fucked up. Everybody went through such horrible things, and I'm really sorry for everyone. That's all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. I promise you, if you stay with us, you will also go through some horrible, horrible things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't worry, Nott. I already have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll get through it, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, nice is boring after a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can get to nice. Right? Eh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would like nice again at some point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just want home back. I want to know that it's safe again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure there's some beachfront property open in Nicodranas. Maybe, if we work really hard and pool our funds, we can retire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're always welcome where I live.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm like nine, so I don't know about retiring yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to be a halfling again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hope that someday it can happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he can help you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not how this shit works.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I guess it remains to be seen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're still pretty cool. I mean, the coolest goblin I've ever known.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I suppose. That one in Nicodranas was pretty cool, though. He had slicked-back hair--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he was wearing pretty fancy clothes and stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want us to still call you Nott?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or Veth? Or Vott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that's weird. Let's stick with Nott for now. When I'm back again, I'll change it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott and Caleb it is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until you're ready for something else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Works great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing makes sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not the name. Not the group. None of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I'm going to bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sad trombone)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You sang!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Weirdest use of Prestidigitation I've ever seen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little floating trombones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mysterious Merrie Melodies like (whoomp).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sad trombone)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As all of you and two other patrons that are couple of other farmhands--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do they look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look like farmhands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is their real name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are they sitting on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Together, they are... Chair.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Chair'otoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a chair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Leave the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When everyone's serious, Taliesin is the comic relief.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here to bring the awkward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The day is yours. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to find an appropriate spot: somewhere quiet, somewhere with a view, somewhere where the Wildmother's work is well at hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That would be probably either on the Tillage itself or some of the small grove clusters along the river that you guys were talking earlier. I assume you're casting Divination?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A reminder, it is a specific question concerning a goal, event, or activity to occur within seven days.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) Ask about the chair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've entirely thrown me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Was the chair made by Geoff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever you're trying to ascertain, it needs to be involving a specific goal, an event, or activity within the next seven days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless you would like me to shift a little bit, for your own--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Choose your words carefully, is all I'm saying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A goal? Hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An event, or an activity. I mean, that's a broad spectrum, so be specific.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yessa. I want to make sure I'm getting the name right, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeza Brenatto.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeza. I sit, make my circle. What is Yeza's destination? Pushing a few days forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (wind blowing) (whispering) "Ghor Dranas."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ghor Dranas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ghor Dranas. Xhorhas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Something Dranas. Ghor Dranas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all I have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've heard that before. That's in Xhorhas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It's in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that mean he's alive?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Caduceus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Citadel! They have a citadel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seems silly to move someone who isn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone here who's proficient in history, make a history check, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's Yasha? Because she's been to fucking Xhorhas before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I know. What's Yasha up to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha's with you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does she know anything about this place?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also had notes, and I read a book at the Cobalt Soul about Xhorhas. I have all that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, good! Yasha first pipes in and goes, "Well, I've heard the name. It's far further north than where I lived, and we avoided it because "a lot of the beast folk live that way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beast folk. What do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's farther north, but I've not been there."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you ever heard of something called the Luxon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that? What's Deluxin'?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Luxon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a casino.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it is not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not sure. I read about them, or it. I don't what it is. Something that is having some sort of negative effect on the people of Ghor Dranas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would I know anything about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's essentially the capital city of the Kryn dynasty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was it that those letters were saying was under Ghor Dranas? Or they were looking for things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that wasn't it. They were saying that they couldn't believe that Ghor Dranas was holding secrets, like that they had a whole other school of magic that we haven't discovered here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It says in there that they control fate and time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha pipes up and says, "From all that I know, people in my clan saying that "that area up north is perpetual night."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From what I hear, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An empress runs it named Leylas Kryn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I remember hearing about her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We may get lucky if we go into the tunnel. They may still be preparing at some point to head in that direction. They're not there yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could go after them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're talking about hundreds of miles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's where they will be, not where they are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a note, just to remind you, if you're thinking of distances and times. The attack transpired weeks ago, so you're not right on their tail. Consider that in what you're planning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They fucking out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mind you, your options are your options.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The north is looking interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are many possibilities here. Many.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are focusing on your fellow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go to Xhorhas, we're in even worse trouble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think trouble's going to close up on us, no matter what.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are beasts in the north, but Yeza is not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, what else are we going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I oddly feel more comfortable going to Ghor Dranas than I do going to Rexxentrum.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like it might be a sign.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (huffs) How do we get there? I mean, are we really going to go through tunnels for several weeks until we get--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got a cart. I'm not even kidding a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe, maybe not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that makes perfect sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then when we get there, what do we say? Hey everybody, we're here in town to sell our wares!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't even know if the tunnels are accessible to us. Why don't we see if they are, first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also say, it's not the worst of the war right now, is Ghor Dranas? That's past it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gentlemen, we can't fight in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the war room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we go over land, we'll be going right through the front of the war. If we go under land, we'll be underground for

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, in tunnels built for war. That's the thing. There's no fighting the war.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree with what one of you said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was probably me. I'm very wise and agreeable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. That once we get there, we're fucking nobodies. What are we going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we can't fight an entire army.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't have to. That's the thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we took that wrong turn at Albuquerque, right? We'll get back and skedaddle out of there if we have to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Want me to send him a message? What if I'm like: Hey dude. Do you think that you're going to be able to escape or something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, weren't we more concerned about that when we thought he was in Rexxentrum?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you did send him a message, I would urge you to do something hopeful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like what? What do you want me to say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stay alive, and we'll try to find you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Describe him to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I always tell him to cut them, but he always keeps them long. He likes them long.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott, can you make yourself look like him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that'll work.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: "Does Alfield-- do they have-- I've never been to Alfield, so I'm just wondering-- "never mind." She turns around.

You see three very, very old farmer-types that this is their retirement, is coming here everyday and complaining and drinking themselves to an early-- earlier-- grave. You do see two crownsguard that are working their way slowly through an ale and chatting to each other. As he walks in, "Hey!" and "Oh, what's up, hey buddy! You're walking around, "that's great!" He's like, (straining) "Yeah, I've got a job for you. What's your name again?"

lines.text: Yes, absolutely!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sounds of distress)

lines.text: Extra five gold, make sure you actually give a fuck about this job.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: "Where did you meet this woman?" He's like, "Look, she's been this way, but she pays well, "apparently, and I want to help you guys out. I'm going to go lay back down," and he starts making his way back with your stick.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: "All right, I got it. No worries, we got it taken care of. We got you taken care of! "We're good! We're just going to finish our drinks and we'll start getting our stuff together."

lines.text: Okay. He makes his way back. You've hired some crownsguards under the table to keep an eye and escort Edith and Luke over to Alfield to meet with Bryce, where they're going to take care of them to some degree.

lines.text: Okay, so what do

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll get one of those and I get one of the money belts. Does anybody else want a money belt? (shouting) Stocking up on money belts!

lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, I thought that it was just going to be a little quick thing and he was going to be like, "For brevity's sake," like he does, but he didn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Nope, this is a full scene.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just want pockets.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's say, eight silver?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, there you go." Passes it over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head to the tunnel and if that doesn't pan out, we'll start heading north.

lines.text: I rearrange some things on the shelves as she's doing that.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: He is happily picking out and handing over belt pouches as you completely disorganize his probably very carefully and intentionally placed system. Well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM, LAURA
lines.text: (shouting) Tunnels!

lines.text: You sense a faint smile over your shoulder.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Secret tunnel.

lines.text: All right, making your way-- oh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any guards around there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yes. You see each tunnel has somewhere in the neighborhood of five to six guards stationed to each. Some of them are just sitting down, bored with their posting. They've been told to keep watch, but not a whole lot's happening until you guys approach. You're heading towards the center tunnel, which is the one that already has the fairly deep dig, and as you approach, the guards all stand up. Some of them are holding spears and are using them to get to their feet. They look over in your direction. These are not the same guards you spoke to last night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord? Caduceus, any ideas on how to get our cart down into the tunnel?

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To get past the guards?

lines.text: The width of the tunnel as it is, the cart's going to be a very tight fit, let alone getting two horses to pull it for you underground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a funny feeling that this is less of a "we can walk all the way to Albuquerque" as more as a there's possibly something down there or they're still in there that's just a little bit of a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is folly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think they've been moving the whole time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The easiest way to check is for, sorry, Jester, to go look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I'll go look. If we can get down there. Hey, so, we were here yesterday.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're part of a research expedition. We were here and we were hoping we could toss you a little bit of coin and, you know, check out this area here a bit.

lines.text: We pinged something in the center cave and we just needed to reconvene before we came back to take a look at it.

lines.text: Cobalt Soul. Beauregard. Been taking notes. From Zadash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's called this belt and these vestiges on my fucking body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just pointed to two orange pockets.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15. You said intimidation, right?

lines.text: Yes. The guy looks at both of you and his chest-puffed moment of bravado begins to slowly deflate and goes, "Right, okay. What are you looking to do? You just inspecting?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's very boring, actually. Yeah. Quite tedious. You use little picks and little brushes, and we covered little--

lines.text: I don't know how that-- I don't really--

lines.text: So we can get down to the barrier where it stops being clear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can climb down because it starts off pretty decent. Where's the cart being left? Or are you bringing it down with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's staying at the inn for the time being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you pre-purchasing board for it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I will cover the cost of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it can stay there as long as you're renting rooms there, but if you just want it to be kept there, it's a little bit cheaper, but you still have to pay in advance for how long you intend to leave it there for storage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't really know what this is going to look like yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two weeks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three. Deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So 16 days.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me, how much would it cost to house our cart here for a month?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. You come back and, talking to Simone Deepwell, he's like, "All right, so, three weeks, you're saying?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A month.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A month. Okay. Just the cart and the horse? All right, I'll go ahead and talk to Babs about "holding the horse, we can go to--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The answer is yes. Whatever it costs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll say for 30 nights it'll be--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We kill him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 90 silver, so nine gold pieces for the month.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not a problem. Here you are. One. Two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take care of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like being at the DMV.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three guards do follow behind at a distance, just keeping an eye on what you're doing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's going in?

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all going in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but who's going past?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to be all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's super strong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, and I will stay super strong as I get down there and Polymorph myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit. Into?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A mole? A gopher? Maybe a gopher.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's big? A tiny gopher?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what burrows that's bigger, is a honey badger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A honey badger. They burrow and are stronger, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, hold on here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait a minute? Can you make people bigger?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For a brief period of time, yeah. Brief.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you make a honey badger bigger?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, for a minute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The size of a dog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it can be a CR seven or lower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Liam Las Vegas is having a weird day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, technically, because-- as you guys rested for the evening and you've completed your journey here and you've begun this next venture-- technically for the night, you guys would hit level eight.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a heads up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh jeez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll deal with that shortly, but for the time being, a CR eight or smaller beast, you could be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. Where would I find that on D&D Beyond?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Creatures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to Monsters and you would choose Beast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All the way to the right, Creatures.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then for the CR range, you would put from-- I'd say, for safety, one to eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are you finding it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right, there's not really anywhere to look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't see Creatures.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Creatures is over here, so Actions, blah blah blah, all of them are right--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, and then what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tap it and then search. Just start typing in a name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Honey badger does not come up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to the world of the druid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then use... Google.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got lost in the-- it got lost in the nervous!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For a badger, a honey badger?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can just-- I think if you go to the top and search "CR 8."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look up level eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look up from levels one to eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Elephant, ape, giant constrictor snake, giant elk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need something that burrows.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Be an elk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't be an elk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Be an elk and kill all of these fucking soldiers. (roars)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So majestic. So proud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Laura, make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Aww.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As high as challenge rating what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I rolled pretty-- I think I-- Hold on, I've got to get back to my character.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You rolled really well, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, I rolled pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hit the view-- yeah, there you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hit the view button, Laura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get lost in here, so, I feel it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Plus-- so 16! I rolled well, but my intelligence is pretty lame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've run across a number of larger versions of these, more dangerous and ominous ones, like when you were in the Savalierwood briefly, you came across a few dire wolves. Use your creative mind on what other possible dire creatures might exist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, like a dire badger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I want to be a dire honey badger!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Large teeth and claws that definitely arc and curve outward to about five, six inches beyond the center of the paw, unretracted.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unretracted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (snorting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the guards take a step back, like, "Uh..."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all normal down here, how are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn back and I go (giggle).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does that last? It lasts for an hour?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Can I talk in Polymorph? No, I'm straight up that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you are a dire honey badger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (honey badger sounds)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dig!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm digging! That's what I'm doing! That's just-- that's what this-- (snarling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I will say-- go ahead and make an athletics check for me, adding what would be the honey badger's strength, a dire honey badger-- I'll say plus three. So, roll a d20, add plus three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww! It was so good and then it went to shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aww, it was so close. Yeah, it did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to take you-- it's a good period of time here of you carving through and taking a break.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to Bless the honey badger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I add plus a d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another hundred or so feet into the tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cast it again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get another level four at level eight? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to go check right now for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That tunnel's really thin. If we can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At level eight, you get a second 4th-level slot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can do it again!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do it again!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. (deep breath)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (boosh) Back into your dire honey badger form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And Bless!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add plus three, plus a d4.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't fuck me!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get us to the Underdark, Laura! Take us to the Underdark.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gil!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gil fucked me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Add your plus four; your d4.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Well, at least that's ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He fucked you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He fucked me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gil!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You carve through, and you reach the other side of this collapsed tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we all instantly die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the molten l-- No, I'm kidding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Minecraft!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've all made this mistake, Taliesin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pick, pick, pick, argh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Granite, granite!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As soon as I make a hole I'll turn back into myself and peek through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we still have Bless? No, that only lasts for a minute. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. As you look past, there's no light source in there, and the hole is only large enough for you to kind of fit your torso through as you glance in. But in the distance you can see-- What is the distance on your darkvision, 60 feet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty sure it's 60 feet. It's a pretty standard 60 feet for--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Darkvision, 60 feet; yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sounds like running water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is everybody with me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're behind you, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys! I think there's a river down here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They didn't just burrow from Xhorhas, they floated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! That's how they do it so quickly or whatever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wonder where this underwater system goes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they all float down here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't want to run into that CR creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like a stream? Oh, we're not there yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you send some light down there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not-- I don't know where we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are all back in the tunnel. It's been dug through, and all of a sudden Jester creates a small hole and then plugs it with herself. You just see the back of Jester, halfway stuck; almost like Winnie the Pooh trying to exit the domicile.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd have to flip around and come back, I suppose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I pull my head back out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or you could go check it out by yourself and see what it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What am I? Who do you think I am?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb, go look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do not send the cleric into the pit of the unknown!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, this new item.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The ball?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It follows me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keep it away from Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll break it. Just send some Dancing Lights.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Send some Dancing Lights in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, I was just curious about my new-- Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, globes appear. By the way, I'm trying to remember. Did you guys take the gray vial with you or did you leave it behind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we took it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and the tripod.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got you. Cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have all the dumb shit we shouldn't have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before we moved on, I just want to make sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We didn't Identify it, though, did we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The globes appear. Are you on the other side of the chamber?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He went in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you go through the hole?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The hole that was dug by our honey badger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an underground river, and it seems to have carved its way through this lower portion of the chamber. It vanishes further below into--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As a point, can I tell if we're walking into any bullshit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coast looks clear.

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you also notice, as the orbs move through, there are crystal-like, I want to say like quartz crystals, that jut from certain portions of the ceiling, and elements of various-- I always mess up on this: stalactites.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've taught myself a million times since I was a kid, and it always transposes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the last second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you send the orbs out further?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm going to pull them back to me and lose three of them, and pull out that rag that I carry around, and cover them so that it's even dimmer. My transmutation stone is set so that I can see in dim light.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be the last one. Who's the last one going through the tunnel before we head over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you all going through?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Going through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who wants to walk with me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're doing this, the one guard is, "Oh hey, uh--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll let you know, or we'll make some noise if anything dangerous is down there. It still could not be safe. You're welcome to come, but I'm not sure if it's going to be-- I can't guarantee any safety beyond this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that deception? All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only because you're being vague enough with it that you're riding the line.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, thank you. Okay, that's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Okay, I guess just give us a holler if something goes down."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, sir. I appreciate everything that you do and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Give a loud holler. We're going to probably scoot back, this is a bit creepy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If things go real wrong, you'll definitely hear us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yells)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (surprised exclamation)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, I tripped. My fault.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll make sure that he's quiet, because we don't mind losing him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, good luck."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I appreciate that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." He turns around, the guards start leaving. You hear this very faint, echoing voice going, "They're fucking crazy!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Crazy like a badger! (badger noises) I'm into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys make your way through the tunnel and join Caleb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all step into the interior, you can also take in that smell of long-sealed underground water, hearing the rushing of the small river. You can see where the path continues on, and with the dim glow and the darkvision, where it curves forward you can see a faint natural arch that looks to be a continuation of the tunnel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Out of curiosity, those crystals feel utterly natural, right? It just feels like those were not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a nature check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have anything to float on? A boat or anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven? Probably?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We left it in Nicodranas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have this boat dagger, I throw it at the wall and (fwoosh).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm thinking about Detect-- Nah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could draw one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just before we move on, is anyone bothered by these crystals? Is this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they creepy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you hear anything? Do you see any kind of traps left behind?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a little out of my element, which is surprising to say.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Traps? On the ceiling? Sure, I'll look for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The people could put them on the ground or anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's difficult, because we don't really understand how they work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is perception because you're looking at things in the distance as opposed to carefully checking what's on the floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perception. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17? Does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Looks okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be way out of our element.

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: Dead men tell no tales...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I cast Pass Without Trace on us and stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's nothing to hide from.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, there's nobody down here but us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You need your spells for other things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we start to hear something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feels like there's always things to hide from. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Except now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without Trace on all of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, there's no one I would rather go rescue my husband with.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you all get a honeymoon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we never did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the way back: great road trip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With seven of your other best friends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For our honeymoon. Never happened. We were saving! I heard Whitestone's really nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tourist trap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) Tourist trap!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start walking forward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin to step forward into the darkened, subterranean shadows of this newly discovered tunnel system, and wherever it will lead you eastward, we're going to go ahead and end tonight's episode there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: God!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Da da

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Da da da!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dun dun

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are going to have to take a break or like a long rest, because I want my 4th-level spells back, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you talking about? You just used two to be a badger twice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to take a long rest at some point. I mean, we're moving, but we're going to obviously have to sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to Xhorhas? To do

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Slow your roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aww, around the corner-- It's 1000 miles away!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We might find a portal down here, you don't know what's here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They might have a little mini-base.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A tiny subterranean boat filled with gummy bears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, should we roll for level eight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: HP, HP, HP!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we do this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't like it, it makes me nervous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A d8, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Level up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When I'm president, they'll just level up for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I want out of my Dungeons & Dragons experience.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you do this? Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just go-- It's over-- Go back to your character page.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm lost already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a d8 die-- Sam, you've played this game for--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Argh, damn it! Self-fulfilling prophecy.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reroll ones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (triumphant gibberish) Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, that's better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! Plus two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Manage levels.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then you go up to level eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus your constitution modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then you go to manage HP.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six, plus...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There we go, manage HP.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it, a d8 plus anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have 47 hit points, I am invincible!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I roll a d8, apparently. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Man, Six six six. Oh, oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hail Satan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where do I put that? Modifier?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you add six to your roll. HP, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's six plus your constitution modifier, but when you level up, it should add that automatically in D&D Beyond.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution modifier auto-adds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you just add the number you rolled.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, ability score improvement!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys get to choose to either add plus two to one of your ability scores, or plus one to two different scores, or choose a feat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy moly!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This'll give you a week to consider, you don't have to consider it right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm already going for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you going for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm doubling the range of my spellcasting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spell Sniper, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spell Sniper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty sick.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to be able to heal from a great distance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's healing for speed--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I can infuse my weapons with poison!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, your melee attacks do additional poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, so much I can do!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) There's so much I can do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "When you cast a spell that requires you to make an attack roll, the spell's range is doubled. Your ranged spell attacks ignore half cover and three-quarter cover. You learn one cantrip that requires an attack roll, choose the cantrip from the Cleric or Druid spell list. Your spellcasting ability for this cantrip is wisdom."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not help your healing distance, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's attack spells.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that may change my decision, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spells that have an attack roll, that's the key. Like, Guiding Bolt: you double your range, but it doesn't affect your healing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or like Bane or Bless, it doesn't help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may play with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, by the way: we've all agreed; no one this whole campaign is taking Lucky, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've literally taken it twice already. I mean, I had options, but I don't remember what they are off the top of my head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No one gets Luck?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the worst fucking feat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's the best feat!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It breaks the game!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the thief of one-shots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. No one's doing Lucky. I'm decreeing it as your president.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't break the game, it's just slightly OP.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need to see more speeches before I know where

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll see who runs against me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Free vending machine in the lobby, then I vote for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you running against him and you're going to give that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or the vending machine is running against him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm not. No, I'm not doing that. I'm just saying, and I-- Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see you soon enough. Until then, have a wonderful week, we love you, and is it Thursday yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Cheers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [no audio] [music]
